results.marketing_text: Just minutes to downtown Los Angeles, the Walls Motel is close to many local attractions including the world famous Queen Mary, California State University Long Beach, Aquarium of the Pacific, Seal Beach Wildlife Refuge, golfing, shopping, and more. This Magnuson Hotels affiliate offers free wireless internet.

results.marketing_text: In a prime location adjacent to the University of Southern California and just south of downtown Los Angeles and the Los Angeles Convention Center, the Radisson Hotel Los Angeles Midtown At USC is an excellent choice for business and leisure traveler
